roleset.name: speak with a burr or make a whirring sound

role.descr: Speaker, or thing making whirring sound

example.name: Invented example
example.text: The fan burred loudly in the background.

roleset.note: BURR-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from burr.01-v)

roleset.name: produce a prickly seed

example.name: sick plant?
example.text: The plant was not burring like it did in August.

roleset.note: Based on Google data. Framed by Katie. Also spelled 'buring'
